Methods

list( options ) → {Promise.<Array.<Object>>}

Description
Gets the list of custom gradebook columns in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
includeHidden boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes hidden gradebook columns as well.
Returns
List of Canvas CustomColumns https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/custom_gradebook_columns.html#CustomColumn
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/GradebookColumn.js, line 30

get( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Gets info on a specific gradebook column in a course. This is a simulated endpoint: it does not exist. We are just pulling the list of columns and returning one element.
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
columnId number Canvas column Id to return
isHidden boolean <optional>
 false Must be set to true if the column you're retrieving is a hidden column.
Returns
Canvas CustomColumn https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/custom_gradebook_columns.html#CustomColumn
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/GradebookColumn.js, line 53

update( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Updates a gradebook column's information
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course ID
columnId number Canvas custom gradebook column ID to query
title string <optional>
 current value New title for the column
position number <optional>
 current value New position for the column in the list of custom gradebook columns
hidden boolean <optional>
 current value If set, updates whether the custom gradebook column is hidden from everyone. Must be a boolean
Returns
Canvas CustomColumn https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/custom_gradebook_columns.html#CustomColumn
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/GradebookColumn.js, line 93

create( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Creates a new gradebook column in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
title string <optional>
 Untitled Column Title of new custom gradebook column
position number <optional>
 last Position of the gradebook column within the list of custom gradebook columns
hidden boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, hides the gradebook column from everyone, not just instructor as usual
Returns
Canvas CustomColumn https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/custom_gradebook_columns.html#CustomColumn
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/GradebookColumn.js, line 174

updateEntries( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Update the list of entries in a specific gradebook column in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
columnId number Gradebook column Id
entries array list of ColumnDatum objects: `[{user_id: , text: }, ...]`
waitForCompletion boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, waits for completion of batch update request
waitForCompletionTimeout number <optional>
 2 Number of minutes to wait for completion of batch upload
Returns
Canvas progress object https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/progress.html#Progress
Details
